-- | Raised when the requested resource cannot be found.

-- | Raised when a malformed input has been provided to the API.

pattern LocationType_Availability_zone :: LocationType
pattern LocationType_Availability_zone_id :: LocationType

newAcceleratorTypeOffering :: AcceleratorTypeOffering

-- | The name of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
acceleratorTypeOffering_acceleratorType :: Lens' AcceleratorTypeOffering (Maybe Text)

-- | The location for the offering. It will return either the region,
--   availability zone or availability zone id for the offering depending
--   on the locationType value.
acceleratorTypeOffering_location :: Lens' AcceleratorTypeOffering (Maybe Text)

-- | The location type for the offering. It can assume the following
--   values: region: defines that the offering is at the regional level.
--   availability-zone: defines that the offering is at the availability
--   zone level. availability-zone-id: defines that the offering is at the
--   availability zone level, defined by the availability zone id.
acceleratorTypeOffering_locationType :: Lens' AcceleratorTypeOffering (Maybe LocationType)

-- | The details of an Elastic Inference Accelerator.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newElasticInferenceAccelerator</a> smart constructor.
data ElasticInferenceAccelerator
ElasticInferenceAccelerator' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth -> Maybe Text -> ElasticInferenceAccelerator

-- | The type of the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
[$sel:acceleratorType:ElasticInferenceAccelerator'] :: ElasticInferenceAccelerator -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
[$sel:acceleratorId:ElasticInferenceAccelerator'] :: ElasticInferenceAccelerator -> Maybe Text

-- | The ARN of the resource that the Elastic Inference Accelerator is
--   attached to.
[$sel:attachedResource:ElasticInferenceAccelerator'] :: ElasticInferenceAccelerator -> Maybe Text

-- | The health of the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
[$sel:acceleratorHealth:ElasticInferenceAccelerator'] :: ElasticInferenceAccelerator -> Maybe ElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth

-- | The availability zone where the Elastic Inference Accelerator is
--   present.

-- | A filter expression for the Elastic Inference Accelerator list.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFilter</a> smart constructor.
data Filter
Filter' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Filter

-- | The values for the filter of the Elastic Inference Accelerator list.
[$sel:values:Filter'] :: Filter -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The filter name for the Elastic Inference Accelerator list. It can
--   assume the following values: accelerator-type: the type of Elastic
--   Inference Accelerator to filter for. instance-id: an EC2 instance id
--   to filter for.
[$sel:name:Filter'] :: Filter -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Filter</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   filter of the Elastic Inference Accelerator list.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:Filter'</a>, <a>filter_name</a> - The filter name for the
--   Elastic Inference Accelerator list. It can assume the following
--   values: accelerator-type: the type of Elastic Inference Accelerator to
--   filter for. instance-id: an EC2 instance id to filter for.
newFilter :: Filter

--   assume the following values: accelerator-type: the type of Elastic
--   Inference Accelerator to filter for. instance-id: an EC2 instance id
--   to filter for.
filter_name :: Lens' Filter (Maybe Text)

--   16bit TeraFLOPS. TFLOPS32bit: the throughput expressed in 32bit
--   TeraFLOPS.

--   16bit TeraFLOPS. TFLOPS32bit: the throughput expressed in 32bit
--   TeraFLOPS.
newKeyValuePair :: KeyValuePair

-- | Describes information over a provided set of accelerators belonging to
--   an account.
--   
--   This operation returns paginated results.
module Amazonka.ElasticInference.DescribeAccelerators

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newDescribeAccelerators</a> smart constructor.
data DescribeAccelerators
DescribeAccelerators' :: Maybe [Filter] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Natural -> Maybe [Text] -> DescribeAccelerators

-- | One or more filters. Filter names and values are case-sensitive. Valid
--   filter names are: accelerator-types: can provide a list of accelerator
--   type names to filter for. instance-id: can provide a list of EC2
--   instance ids to filter for.
[$sel:filters:DescribeAccelerators'] :: DescribeAccelerators -> Maybe [Filter]

-- | A token to specify where to start paginating. This is the NextToken
--   from a previously truncated response.
[$sel:nextToken:DescribeAccelerators'] :: DescribeAccelerators -> Maybe Text

-- | The total number of items to return in the command's output. If the
--   total number of items available is more than the value specified, a
--   NextToken is provided in the command's output. To resume pagination,
--   provide the NextToken value in the starting-token argument of a
--   subsequent command. Do not use the NextToken response element directly
--   outside of the AWS CLI.
[$sel:maxResults:DescribeAccelerators'] :: DescribeAccelerators -> Maybe Natural

-- | The IDs of the accelerators to describe.
[$sel:acceleratorIds:DescribeAccelerators'] :: DescribeAccelerators -> Maybe [Text]

-- | Create a value of <a>DescribeAccelerators</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:filters:DescribeAccelerators'</a>,
--   <a>describeAccelerators_filters</a> - One or more filters. Filter
--   names and values are case-sensitive. Valid filter names are:
--   accelerator-types: can provide a list of accelerator type names to
--   filter for. instance-id: can provide a list of EC2 instance ids to
--   filter for.
--   
--   <a>$sel:nextToken:DescribeAccelerators'</a>,
--   <a>describeAccelerators_nextToken</a> - A token to specify where to
--   start paginating. This is the NextToken from a previously truncated
--   response.

--   <a>$sel:maxResults:DescribeAccelerators'</a>,
--   <a>describeAccelerators_maxResults</a> - The total number of items to
--   return in the command's output. If the total number of items available
--   is more than the value specified, a NextToken is provided in the
--   command's output. To resume pagination, provide the NextToken value in
--   the starting-token argument of a subsequent command. Do not use the

--   accelerators to describe.

--   instance ids to filter for.

--   from a previously truncated response.

-- | Describes the accelerator types available in a given region, as well
--   as their characteristics, such as memory and throughput.
module Amazonka.ElasticInference.DescribeAcceleratorTypes

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newDescribeAcceleratorTypes</a> smart constructor.
data DescribeAcceleratorTypes
DescribeAcceleratorTypes' :: DescribeAcceleratorTypes

-- | Create a value of <a>DescribeAcceleratorTypes</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
newDescribeAcceleratorTypes :: DescribeAcceleratorTypes

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newDescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.
data DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse
DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse' :: Maybe [AcceleratorType] -> Int -> DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse

-- | The available accelerator types.
[$sel:acceleratorTypes:DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse'] :: DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse -> Maybe [AcceleratorType]

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse'] :: DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:acceleratorTypes:DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse'</a>,
--   <a>describeAcceleratorTypesResponse_acceleratorTypes</a> - The
--   available accelerator types.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse'</a>,
--   <a>describeAcceleratorTypesResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's
--   http status code.
newDescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse :: Int -> DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse

-- | The available accelerator types.

-- | The response's http status code.
describeAcceleratorTypesResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse Int

-- | Describes the locations in which a given accelerator type or set of
--   types is present in a given region.
module Amazonka.ElasticInference.DescribeAcceleratorOfferings

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newDescribeAcceleratorOfferings</a> smart constructor.
data DescribeAcceleratorOfferings
DescribeAcceleratorOfferings' :: Maybe [Text] -> LocationType -> DescribeAcceleratorOfferings

-- | The list of accelerator types to describe.
[$sel:acceleratorTypes:DescribeAcceleratorOfferings'] :: DescribeAcceleratorOfferings -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The location type that you want to describe accelerator type offerings
--   for. It can assume the following values: region: will return the
--   accelerator type offering at the regional level. availability-zone:
--   will return the accelerator type offering at the availability zone
--   level. availability-zone-id: will return the accelerator type offering
--   at the availability zone level returning the availability zone id.
[$sel:locationType:DescribeAcceleratorOfferings'] :: DescribeAcceleratorOfferings -> LocationType

-- | Create a value of <a>DescribeAcceleratorOfferings</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:acceleratorTypes:DescribeAcceleratorOfferings'</a>,
--   <a>describeAcceleratorOfferings_acceleratorTypes</a> - The list of
--   accelerator types to describe.
--   
--   <a>$sel:locationType:DescribeAcceleratorOfferings'</a>,
--   <a>describeAcceleratorOfferings_locationType</a> - The location type
--   that you want to describe accelerator type offerings for. It can
--   assume the following values: region: will return the accelerator type
--   offering at the regional level. availability-zone: will return the
--   accelerator type offering at the availability zone level.
--   availability-zone-id: will return the accelerator type offering at the
--   availability zone level returning the availability zone id.
newDescribeAcceleratorOfferings :: LocationType -> DescribeAcceleratorOfferings

-- | The list of accelerator types to describe.
describeAcceleratorOfferings_acceleratorTypes :: Lens' DescribeAcceleratorOfferings (Maybe [Text])

-- | The location type that you want to describe accelerator type offerings
--   for. It can assume the following values: region: will return the
--   accelerator type offering at the regional level. availability-zone:
--   will return the accelerator type offering at the availability zone
--   level. availability-zone-id: will return the accelerator type offering
--   at the availability zone level returning the availability zone id.
describeAcceleratorOfferings_locationType :: Lens' DescribeAcceleratorOfferings LocationType

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newDescribeAcceleratorOfferingsResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.

-- | Removes the specified tags from an Elastic Inference Accelerator.
module Amazonka.ElasticInference.UntagResource

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newUntagResource</a> smart constructor.
data UntagResource
UntagResource' :: Text -> NonEmpty Text -> UntagResource

-- | The ARN of the Elastic Inference Accelerator to untag.
[$sel:resourceArn:UntagResource'] :: UntagResource -> Text

-- | The list of tags to remove from the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
[$sel:tagKeys:UntagResource'] :: UntagResource -> NonEmpty Text

-- | Create a value of <a>UntagResource</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   Accelerator to untag.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tagKeys:UntagResource'</a>, <a>untagResource_tagKeys</a> - The
--   list of tags to remove from the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
newUntagResource :: Text -> NonEmpty Text -> UntagResource

-- | The ARN of the Elastic Inference Accelerator to untag.
untagResource_resourceArn :: Lens' UntagResource Text

-- | The list of tags to remove from the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
untagResource_tagKeys :: Lens' UntagResource (NonEmpty Text)

module Amazonka.ElasticInference.Lens

-- | The ARN of the Elastic Inference Accelerator to list the tags for.
listTagsForResource_resourceArn :: Lens' ListTagsForResource Text

-- | The tags of the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
listTagsForResourceResponse_tags :: Lens' ListTagsForResourceResponse (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The response's http status code.
listTagsForResourceResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' ListTagsForResourceResponse Int

-- | The list of accelerator types to describe.
describeAcceleratorOfferings_acceleratorTypes :: Lens' DescribeAcceleratorOfferings (Maybe [Text])

-- | The location type that you want to describe accelerator type offerings
--   for. It can assume the following values: region: will return the
--   accelerator type offering at the regional level. availability-zone:
--   will return the accelerator type offering at the availability zone
--   level. availability-zone-id: will return the accelerator type offering
--   at the availability zone level returning the availability zone id.
describeAcceleratorOfferings_locationType :: Lens' DescribeAcceleratorOfferings LocationType

-- | The list of accelerator type offerings for a specific location.
describeAcceleratorOfferingsResponse_acceleratorTypeOfferings :: Lens' DescribeAcceleratorOfferingsResponse (Maybe [AcceleratorTypeOffering])

-- | The response's http status code.
describeAcceleratorOfferingsResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' DescribeAcceleratorOfferingsResponse Int

-- | One or more filters. Filter names and values are case-sensitive. Valid
--   filter names are: accelerator-types: can provide a list of accelerator
--   type names to filter for. instance-id: can provide a list of EC2
--   instance ids to filter for.
describeAccelerators_filters :: Lens' DescribeAccelerators (Maybe [Filter])

-- | A token to specify where to start paginating. This is the NextToken
--   from a previously truncated response.
describeAccelerators_nextToken :: Lens' DescribeAccelerators (Maybe Text)

-- | The total number of items to return in the command's output. If the
--   total number of items available is more than the value specified, a
--   NextToken is provided in the command's output. To resume pagination,
--   provide the NextToken value in the starting-token argument of a
--   subsequent command. Do not use the NextToken response element directly
--   outside of the AWS CLI.
describeAccelerators_maxResults :: Lens' DescribeAccelerators (Maybe Natural)

-- | The IDs of the accelerators to describe.
describeAccelerators_acceleratorIds :: Lens' DescribeAccelerators (Maybe [Text])

-- | The details of the Elastic Inference Accelerators.
describeAcceleratorsResponse_acceleratorSet :: Lens' DescribeAcceleratorsResponse (Maybe [ElasticInferenceAccelerator])

-- | A token to specify where to start paginating. This is the NextToken
--   from a previously truncated response.
describeAcceleratorsResponse_nextToken :: Lens' DescribeAcceleratorsResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The response's http status code.
describeAcceleratorsResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' DescribeAcceleratorsResponse Int

-- | The ARN of the Elastic Inference Accelerator to tag.
tagResource_resourceArn :: Lens' TagResource Text

-- | The tags to add to the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
tagResource_tags :: Lens' TagResource (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The response's http status code.
tagResourceResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' TagResourceResponse Int

-- | The ARN of the Elastic Inference Accelerator to untag.
untagResource_resourceArn :: Lens' UntagResource Text

-- | The list of tags to remove from the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
untagResource_tagKeys :: Lens' UntagResource (NonEmpty Text)

-- | The response's http status code.
untagResourceResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' UntagResourceResponse Int

-- | The available accelerator types.
describeAcceleratorTypesResponse_acceleratorTypes :: Lens' DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse (Maybe [AcceleratorType])

-- | The response's http status code.
describeAcceleratorTypesResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse Int

-- | The throughput information of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
acceleratorType_throughputInfo :: Lens' AcceleratorType (Maybe [KeyValuePair])

-- | The memory information of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
acceleratorType_memoryInfo :: Lens' AcceleratorType (Maybe MemoryInfo)

-- | The name of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
acceleratorType_acceleratorTypeName :: Lens' AcceleratorType (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
acceleratorTypeOffering_acceleratorType :: Lens' AcceleratorTypeOffering (Maybe Text)

-- | The location for the offering. It will return either the region,
--   availability zone or availability zone id for the offering depending
--   on the locationType value.
acceleratorTypeOffering_location :: Lens' AcceleratorTypeOffering (Maybe Text)

-- | The location type for the offering. It can assume the following
--   values: region: defines that the offering is at the regional level.
--   availability-zone: defines that the offering is at the availability
--   zone level. availability-zone-id: defines that the offering is at the
--   availability zone level, defined by the availability zone id.
acceleratorTypeOffering_locationType :: Lens' AcceleratorTypeOffering (Maybe LocationType)

-- | The type of the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
elasticInferenceAccelerator_acceleratorType :: Lens' ElasticInferenceAccelerator (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
elasticInferenceAccelerator_acceleratorId :: Lens' ElasticInferenceAccelerator (Maybe Text)

-- | The ARN of the resource that the Elastic Inference Accelerator is
--   attached to.
elasticInferenceAccelerator_attachedResource :: Lens' ElasticInferenceAccelerator (Maybe Text)

-- | The health of the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
elasticInferenceAccelerator_acceleratorHealth :: Lens' ElasticInferenceAccelerator (Maybe ElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth)

-- | The availability zone where the Elastic Inference Accelerator is
--   present.
elasticInferenceAccelerator_availabilityZone :: Lens' ElasticInferenceAccelerator (Maybe Text)

-- | The health status of the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
elasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth_status :: Lens' ElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth (Maybe Text)

-- | The values for the filter of the Elastic Inference Accelerator list.
filter_values :: Lens' Filter (Maybe [Text])

-- | The filter name for the Elastic Inference Accelerator list. It can
--   assume the following values: accelerator-type: the type of Elastic
--   Inference Accelerator to filter for. instance-id: an EC2 instance id
--   to filter for.
filter_name :: Lens' Filter (Maybe Text)

-- | The throughput value of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
keyValuePair_value :: Lens' KeyValuePair (Maybe Int)

-- | The throughput value of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type. It can
--   assume the following values: TFLOPS16bit: the throughput expressed in
--   16bit TeraFLOPS. TFLOPS32bit: the throughput expressed in 32bit
--   TeraFLOPS.
keyValuePair_key :: Lens' KeyValuePair (Maybe Text)

-- | The size in mebibytes of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
memoryInfo_sizeInMiB :: Lens' MemoryInfo (Maybe Int)


module Amazonka.ElasticInference.Waiters

--   Elastic Inference public APIs.

--   configuration.

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newTagResource</a> smart constructor.
data TagResource
TagResource' :: Text -> HashMap Text Text -> TagResource

-- | Create a value of <a>TagResource</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceArn:TagResource'</a>, <a>tagResource_resourceArn</a> -
--   The ARN of the Elastic Inference Accelerator to tag.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:TagResource'</a>, <a>tagResource_tags</a> - The tags to
--   add to the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
newTagResource :: Text -> TagResource

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newTagResourceResponse</a> smart constructor.
data TagResourceResponse
TagResourceResponse' :: Int -> TagResourceResponse

-- | Create a value of <a>TagResourceResponse</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:TagResourceResponse'</a>,
--   <a>tagResourceResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's http status
--   code.
newTagResourceResponse :: Int -> TagResourceResponse

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newUntagResource</a> smart constructor.
data UntagResource
UntagResource' :: Text -> NonEmpty Text -> UntagResource

-- | Create a value of <a>UntagResource</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceArn:UntagResource'</a>,
--   <a>untagResource_resourceArn</a> - The ARN of the Elastic Inference
--   Accelerator to untag.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tagKeys:UntagResource'</a>, <a>untagResource_tagKeys</a> - The
--   list of tags to remove from the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
newUntagResource :: Text -> NonEmpty Text -> UntagResource

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newUntagResourceResponse</a> smart constructor.
data UntagResourceResponse
UntagResourceResponse' :: Int -> UntagResourceResponse

-- | Create a value of <a>UntagResourceResponse</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:UntagResourceResponse'</a>,
--   <a>untagResourceResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's http status
--   code.
newUntagResourceResponse :: Int -> UntagResourceResponse

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newDescribeAcceleratorTypes</a> smart constructor.
data DescribeAcceleratorTypes
DescribeAcceleratorTypes' :: DescribeAcceleratorTypes

-- | Create a value of <a>DescribeAcceleratorTypes</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
newDescribeAcceleratorTypes :: DescribeAcceleratorTypes

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newDescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.
data DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse
DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse' :: Maybe [AcceleratorType] -> Int -> DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse

-- | Create a value of <a>DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:acceleratorTypes:DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse'</a>,
--   <a>describeAcceleratorTypesResponse_acceleratorTypes</a> - The
--   available accelerator types.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse'</a>,
--   <a>describeAcceleratorTypesResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's
--   http status code.
newDescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse :: Int -> DescribeAcceleratorTypesResponse
newtype LocationType
LocationType' :: Text -> LocationType
[fromLocationType] :: LocationType -> Text
pattern LocationType_Availability_zone :: LocationType
pattern LocationType_Availability_zone_id :: LocationType
pattern LocationType_Region :: LocationType

-- | The details of an Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAcceleratorType</a> smart constructor.
data AcceleratorType
AcceleratorType' :: Maybe [KeyValuePair] -> Maybe MemoryInfo -> Maybe Text -> AcceleratorType

-- | Create a value of <a>AcceleratorType</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:throughputInfo:AcceleratorType'</a>,
--   <a>acceleratorType_throughputInfo</a> - The throughput information of
--   the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:memoryInfo:AcceleratorType'</a>,
--   <a>acceleratorType_memoryInfo</a> - The memory information of the
--   Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:acceleratorTypeName:AcceleratorType'</a>,
--   <a>acceleratorType_acceleratorTypeName</a> - The name of the Elastic
--   Inference Accelerator type.
newAcceleratorType :: AcceleratorType

-- | The offering for an Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAcceleratorTypeOffering</a> smart constructor.
data AcceleratorTypeOffering
AcceleratorTypeOffering' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe LocationType -> AcceleratorTypeOffering

-- | Create a value of <a>AcceleratorTypeOffering</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:acceleratorType:AcceleratorTypeOffering'</a>,
--   <a>acceleratorTypeOffering_acceleratorType</a> - The name of the
--   Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:location:AcceleratorTypeOffering'</a>,
--   <a>acceleratorTypeOffering_location</a> - The location for the
--   offering. It will return either the region, availability zone or
--   availability zone id for the offering depending on the locationType
--   value.
--   
--   <a>$sel:locationType:AcceleratorTypeOffering'</a>,
--   <a>acceleratorTypeOffering_locationType</a> - The location type for
--   the offering. It can assume the following values: region: defines that
--   the offering is at the regional level. availability-zone: defines that
--   the offering is at the availability zone level. availability-zone-id:
--   defines that the offering is at the availability zone level, defined
--   by the availability zone id.
newAcceleratorTypeOffering :: AcceleratorTypeOffering

-- | The details of an Elastic Inference Accelerator.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newElasticInferenceAccelerator</a> smart constructor.
data ElasticInferenceAccelerator
ElasticInferenceAccelerator' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth -> Maybe Text -> ElasticInferenceAccelerator

-- | Create a value of <a>ElasticInferenceAccelerator</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:acceleratorType:ElasticInferenceAccelerator'</a>,
--   <a>elasticInferenceAccelerator_acceleratorType</a> - The type of the
--   Elastic Inference Accelerator.
--   
--   <a>$sel:acceleratorId:ElasticInferenceAccelerator'</a>,
--   <a>elasticInferenceAccelerator_acceleratorId</a> - The ID of the
--   Elastic Inference Accelerator.
--   
--   <a>$sel:attachedResource:ElasticInferenceAccelerator'</a>,
--   <a>elasticInferenceAccelerator_attachedResource</a> - The ARN of the
--   resource that the Elastic Inference Accelerator is attached to.
--   
--   <a>$sel:acceleratorHealth:ElasticInferenceAccelerator'</a>,
--   <a>elasticInferenceAccelerator_acceleratorHealth</a> - The health of
--   the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
--   
--   <a>$sel:availabilityZone:ElasticInferenceAccelerator'</a>,
--   <a>elasticInferenceAccelerator_availabilityZone</a> - The availability
--   zone where the Elastic Inference Accelerator is present.
newElasticInferenceAccelerator :: ElasticInferenceAccelerator

-- | The health details of an Elastic Inference Accelerator.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth</a> smart
--   constructor.
data ElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth
ElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth' :: Maybe Text -> ElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth

-- | Create a value of <a>ElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:ElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth'</a>,
--   <a>elasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth_status</a> - The health status of
--   the Elastic Inference Accelerator.
newElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth :: ElasticInferenceAcceleratorHealth

-- | A filter expression for the Elastic Inference Accelerator list.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFilter</a> smart constructor.
data Filter
Filter' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Filter

-- | Create a value of <a>Filter</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:values:Filter'</a>, <a>filter_values</a> - The values for the
--   filter of the Elastic Inference Accelerator list.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:Filter'</a>, <a>filter_name</a> - The filter name for the
--   Elastic Inference Accelerator list. It can assume the following
--   values: accelerator-type: the type of Elastic Inference Accelerator to
--   filter for. instance-id: an EC2 instance id to filter for.
newFilter :: Filter

-- | A throughput entry for an Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newKeyValuePair</a> smart constructor.
data KeyValuePair
KeyValuePair' :: Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> KeyValuePair

-- | Create a value of <a>KeyValuePair</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:KeyValuePair'</a>, <a>keyValuePair_value</a> - The
--   throughput value of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:KeyValuePair'</a>, <a>keyValuePair_key</a> - The
--   throughput value of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type. It can
--   assume the following values: TFLOPS16bit: the throughput expressed in
--   16bit TeraFLOPS. TFLOPS32bit: the throughput expressed in 32bit
--   TeraFLOPS.
newKeyValuePair :: KeyValuePair

-- | The memory information of an Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newMemoryInfo</a> smart constructor.
data MemoryInfo
MemoryInfo' :: Maybe Int -> MemoryInfo

-- | Create a value of <a>MemoryInfo</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sizeInMiB:MemoryInfo'</a>, <a>memoryInfo_sizeInMiB</a> - The
--   size in mebibytes of the Elastic Inference Accelerator type.
newMemoryInfo :: MemoryInfo
